result.execSummary:
The defendant Gary Alan Boyd was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Aggravated Battery-Elderly [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(6)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Pay direct to Clerk of Courts

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Gary Alan Boyd in court in custody with attorney Valerie A. Zisman.  Richard Jay Sullivan appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant pleads guilty to count 1. Court finds defendant guilty of count 1. Court orders 1 year jail with huber. Sentence credit  91 days. Count 2 dismissed and read in.

Defendant Gary Alan Boyd in court with attorney David Hart for Valerie A. Zisman.  Katharine Buker appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Information filed, copy to Defendant, reading waived.    Defendant stands mute, not guilty plea entered by court, jury trial to be set.

Defendant Gary Alan Boyd in court in custody with attorney Valerie A. Zisman.  Mary Elizabeth Bricco appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant waives preliminary hearing freely and voluntarily.  Court accepts waiver and binds the Defendant over for the filing of an Information.  Arraignment scheduled for November 6, 2015 at 03:00 pm.

Defendant Gary Alan Boyd in court in custody with attorney Valerie A. Zisman.  Mason C. Braunschweig appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for November 3, 2015 at 03:00 pm.

Defendant Gary Alan Boyd in court in custody with attorney Valerie A. Zisman.  Jodi Dabson Bollendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Complaint filed, copy to Defendant, penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Cash bond of $500 set. Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for 10-30-15 at 3:00pm.
No contact directly or indirectly with victim, S.B.  his/her residence, place of employment, vehicle, or elsewhere.
